Determines if a vendor can purchase their own products.
doc.long_description: This filter allows altering the purchasable status of a product based on whether the vendor is attempting to purchase their own product. It can be used to restrict or allow such purchases according to business rules.
doc.long_description_html: This filter allows altering the purchasable status of a product based on whether the vendor is attempting to purchase their own product. It can be used to restrict or allow such purchases according to business rules.

tags.name: param
tags.content: Indicates if the product is purchasable. True by default.

tags.name: param
tags.content: The product object being evaluated for purchasability.

doc.description: Filters the populated data for a settings element.

Filter the found customers for Dokan REST API search.
doc.long_description: This filter allows you to modify the list of customers found during a search before it is returned by the REST API.
doc.long_description_html: This filter allows you to modify the list of customers found during a search before it is returned by the REST API.

tags.name: param
tags.content: An array of found customers. Each customer is an array containing: 'id' => (int) The customer's ID. 'name' => (string) The customer's full name. 'email' => (string) The customer's email address.

tags.name: param
tags.content: The search term used to find customers.

tags.name: param
tags.content: An array of customer IDs to exclude from the search results.

tags.name: param
tags.content: The maximum number of results to return (if any).

tags.name: return
tags.content: The filtered array of found customers.

doc.description: Determine the order listing statuses on the Dokan dashboard.
doc.long_description: This hook allows developers to modify or extend the list of order statuses used in the order listing on the Dokan vendor dashboard. It can be used to add new statuses or modify existing ones to customize the dashboard functionality.
doc.long_description_html: This hook allows developers to modify or extend the list of order statuses used in the order listing on the Dokan vendor dashboard. It can be used to add new statuses or modify existing ones to customize the dashboard functionality.

tags.name: param
tags.content: Array of order statuses with all. Key is the status slug, and value is the display label.

Filter the whitelist of allowed status transitions for sub-orders.
doc.long_description: This filter allows developers to customize the whitelist that determines which status transitions are allowed for sub-orders when the main order status is updated. By modifying this whitelist, you can control how sub-order statuses are updated in relation to the main order.
doc.long_description_html: This filter allows developers to customize the whitelist that determines which status transitions are allowed for sub-orders when the main order status is updated. By modifying this whitelist, you can control how sub-order statuses are updated in relation to the main order.

tags.name: param
tags.content: An associative array where keys are current statuses and values are arrays of allowed new statuses. The special value 'any' allows transition to any status.

tags.name: return
tags.content: Modified whitelist of allowed status transitions.
